activity.title: coronasafe/care_fe#6854
activity.text:
@rithviknishad 
If I'm operating a device having this much width:

![image](https://github.com/coronasafe/care_fe/assets/129517558/c9897b35-7c3b-41a1-b7ec-a8a29fddac80)

You can see that the slideover is covering whole screen. If I increase the width of slideover then the user have to slide left and to see see the slideover content completely. Is it ok doing so?

activity.title: coronasafe/care_fe#6854
activity.text: @nihal467 What I'm supposed to do now? Should I decrease the width of administration section to some more extent as the prescription card can't be altered being a reusable component? Please give some clarification about it.
